channel.title: SFOL 25 Return of the Blue Dragon II Unseen and Mercenary Win!
channel.description:
The Unseen had won, taking over Castle Adiart. But now, the small remainder of the Blue Dragon is fighting to take it over again!
[color=deeppink] Welcome one and all to a game where this time, the informed minority is the Blue Dragon, trying to get their Kingdom back from the clutches of the Unseen. [/color]
**Rules:**
* [color=deeppink] Days will last 96 hours (4 IRL days)[/color]
* [color=deeppink] Nights will last 48 hours (2 IRL days)[/color]
* [color=deeppink] Players must post content within 24 hours. If no content has been posted for that long, then that player will recieve a prod. Failing to respond within 24 hours after the prod (as some players may be in different timezones) will result the player in getting replaced[/color]
* [color=deeppink]Journals will be presented on death, but only updated ones[/color]
* [color=deeppink]Blue Dragon will have a night chat **only**[/color]
* [color=deeppink]A specific player can only be sent on trial once per day. If pardoned, they will gain immunity to being a valid vote until the next day[/color]
**The Changes:**
* [color=deeppink] The Unseen has become the uninformed majority[/color]
* [color=deeppink]Neutrals still spawn as usual besides mercenary which will spawn as old mercenary because soldier is in this game[/color]
* [color=deeppink] Mastermind, Assassin and Sellsword will **NOT** spawn in the game[/color]
* [color=deeppink] The cap size for the Blue Dragon is 4[/color]
* [color=deeppink] If the Negotiator dies, the newest member will become the Negotiator. If the Negotiator dies and there is only the oldest Blue Dragon Killer, then they will become the new Negotiator[/color]
[color=deeppink] The Insurgent **cannot** be replaced[/color]
[color=deeppink] All conversions have unique abilities, except the Knight[/color]
[details = “Class Cards”] [details = “The new classes: BD Returned]
>## [color=steblue]The Negotiator[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Special**[/color] **Undercover Rebel (Passive)** - You will appear to be a Servant to investigators for the first three nights. **Busy (Passive)** - Immune to Occupation. **Persuade (Night)** - Persuade someone to join the Blue Dragon. - Infinite uses, 1 day cooldown.
>## [color=steblue]The Insurgent[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Vengeance (Day)** - Your attack will pierce night immunity tonight. - Gains 1 use for each dead member of the Blue Dragon. **Eliminate (Night)** - Kill a target player if they are a member of the Unseen. If they are a neutral, they will instead be occupied. You will know which happened. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] New class - Soldier
[details = “The BD converted Mercenary:”]
>## [color=steblue]The Soldier[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] **Defend (Night)** Protect a Blue Dragon player, giving them visitation immunity. - 3 uses. **Payback (Night)** Attack a player who voted a Blue Dragon player for treason. **Soldier's Special:** Attack any player. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Mercenary [details="Mercenary"]
[color = darkyellow]Mercenary[/color] - **Looking for Work (Passive)** - If your original target dies, you have 3 days to find another or you will die. **Failure (Passive)**- If your original target and your new target die, you will commit suicide. **Offer Contract (Day)** - If your original target dies, you may form a contract with another player during the day. - 3 uses **Stand Guard (Night)** - Protect your target from visits, and grant yourself immunity to death tonight. - 4 uses **Rebound (Night)** - Kill a player who accused your target of treason earlier in the day. - 1 use Your objective is to ensure that your target remains alive until the end of the game, your target is [x]. [/details]
The converted Prince, guaranteed to spawn: [details = “Convered Prince = Kidnapper”] >## [color=purple]The Kidnapper **(Unique)**[/color] :shield: >[color=purple]**Unseen Killer**[/color] **Unstoppable (Passive)** - Immune to being occupied at night. **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **Imprison (Day)** - Choose a player to imprison at night, Occupying the target (Bypasses Occupy Immunity). - Infinite uses. **Execute (Night)** - Kill the imprisoned player (Bypass Night Immunity). If you execute a member of the Unseen, you lose all your remaining executions. - 3 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Now, for the changed classes:
Servant and Butler Classes [details = “Servant - Butler”] >## [color=steblue]The Butler[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Offensive**[/color] **Dutiful (Passive)** - Immune to occupation. **Nightshade Wine (Day)** After 3 days you can poison the The King, causing him to die in two nights if not healed by a Physician. If the King is a member of the Blue Dragon, you will take your own life. - 1 use. **Serve Wine (Night)** - Occupy a player by getting them drunk. **Butler Special:** Get a player so drunk that they will be occupied again tomorrow night. - 1 use **Concentrated Wine (Night)** - Throw a party, occupying all players who visit you tonight. - 2 uses. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Servant[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Dutiful (Passive)** - Immune to occupation. **Nightshade Wine (Day)** - After 3 days you can poison the The King, causing him to die in two nights if not healed by a Physician. If the King is a member of the Unseen, you will take your own life. - 1 use. **Serve Wine (Night)** - Occupy a player by getting them drunk. - Infinite uses. **Concentrated Wine (Night)** - Throw a party, occupying all players who visit you tonight. - 2 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Court Wizard - Sage classes [details = “Sage - Court Wizard”] >## [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] **Illusion (Day)** - Cast an illusion in the court. The user of the ability will believe they used their ability on themselves (shocked). - 2 uses. **Ice Ward (Night)** - Freeze a player's room preventing anyone from visiting them. - 2 Uses **Court Wizard Special** All Blue Dragon members will still be able to visit the target encased in ice. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Sage[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Shock (Day)** - Shock the target player, causing them to target themselves today if they use their day abilty. - 2 uses. **Wall of Fire (Night)** - Summon a wall of fire at a player’s door, preventing everyone from visiting them. - 2 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Drunk vs. Alcoholic [details = “Drunk - Alcoholic”] >## [color=steblue]The Drunk[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Offensive**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **I am the Liquor (Passive)** - Immune to being occupied during the night. **Debauchery (Night)** - Get in a player’s way, causing them to target you. - Infinite uses. **Happy Hour (Night)** - Occupy and get rid of your target’s night and occupy immunities for the night. - 2 uses. **Drunk's Special -** **Hangover (Night)** - Make a player unable to talk or vote for 24 hours (Prods given will not count. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Alcoholic[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **Debauchery (Night)** - Get in a player’s way, causing them to target you. Does not work with conversion abilities. - Infinite uses. **Happy Hour (Night)** - Occupy and get rid of your target's night and occupy immunities for the night. - 2 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Hunter vs. Poacher [details = “Hunter - Poacher”] >## [color=steblue]The Hunter **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Isolation (Passive)** - Immune to occupation. **Wolf Companion (Night)** - Summon a wolf to attack someone. They will die instantly, but if they are death immune they will instead bleed and die in one day unless healed. - Can only be used if you are the oldest Blue Dragon Killer. Infinite uses. **Spike Traps (Night)** - Set spiked traps in your home to hurt all intruders. If trapped, the visitors wills bleed and die in a day, if untreated. You will be immune to death. - 4 uses **Hunter's Special:** Visitors die instantly, piercing death immunity. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Poacher **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Retribution (Passive)** - If found guilty of treason, you will kill your accuser before your execution. **Isolation (Passive)** - Immune to occupation. **Bear Companion (Night)** - Summon a bear companion to maul a target player, making them bleed and die in one day unless healed. - 2 uses. **Spike Traps (Night)** - Set spiked traps in your home to hurt all intruders. If trapped, the visitors will bleed and die in a day, if untreated. You will be immune to death and conversion. - 2 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Knight vs. Enforcer [details = “Knight - Enforcer”] >## [color=steblue]The Knight[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Protection (Night)** - Protect the Blue Dragon faction at night, giving up your life to save theirs if needed. **Cold Steel (Night)** - Kill a target player. - Can only be used if you are the oldest Blue Dragon Killer. Infinite uses. **Frenzy (Night)** - Kill a target player. Bypasses night Immunity, Occupying, and healing. - 1 use. **This class does not have a special as Frenzy is essentially the Special** *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Enforcer[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Support**[/color] **Sacrifice (Night)** - Protect a player, giving your life to kill their attackers. - Infinite Uses **Cold Steel (Night)** - Kill a target player. If they are a member of the Unseen, you will die. - Unlimited uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Noble - Note: Aristocrat will stay the same therefore the Aristocrat is not here [details = “Noble”] >## [color=steblue]The Noble[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Social**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **[Call to Arms Only]** **Manipulate (Day, Special)** - Choose who the person you used Order on will vote. - Infinite uses. **Crier (Night)** - Send for a crier to deliver a message to the court at the start of the next day. - Infinite uses. **Order (Night)** - Negate the votes of a target player the next day. They can't accuse anyone or vote tomorrow. **Call to Arms Effect:** The day after using this ability, you will gain **Manipulate**. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Aristocrat[/color] >[color=purple]Unseen Social[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - You can step up to become the new King earlier than other players. **Pull Rank (Day)** - Your vote will count as two today. This will not be announced publicly or affect the number of votes required to reach majority. - 3 uses **Order (Night)** - Negate the votes of a target player the next day. They can’t accuse anyone or vote tomorrow. The target still counts towards the voting majority. - Infinite uses **Bounty (Night)** - If target player is executed tomorrow and is Unseen then there will be an additional trial and execution. Only one Bounty may take effect per day. You cannot target King. - 2 uses Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.
[/details] Observer vs. Nightwatch [details = “Observer - Nightwatch”] >## [color=steblue]The Observer[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] **Angry Bird (Day)**- You will be told the name of the next player to use a day ability - 2 uses **Follow (Night)** - Observe a player to see who visits them and who they visited at night. - Infinite uses. **Window Peek (Night)** - Reveal a player's faction. **Observor's Special:** Reveal their exact class - 1 use *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Nightwatch[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] **Follow (Night)** - Observe a player to see who visits them and who they visited at night. - Infinite uses. **Window Peek (Night)** - Reveal a player's faction. - 2 uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Physician vs. Herbalist [details = “Physician - Herbalist”] >## [color=steblue]The Physician[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] **Remedy Studies (Passive)** - Immune to *nightshade* poison, and all forms of bleed. **Drug (Night)** - Trick a player in believing that they were attacked and healed - 2 uses **Defile (Night)** - If the target player dies tonight, they will appear as a class of your own choice - 3 uses **[Physician's Special]** **Concentrated Nightshade (Night)** - Poison the target player with a concentrated dose of nightshade, causing them to die instantly. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Herbalist[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Support**[/color] **Remedy Studies (Passive)** - Immune to *nightshade* poison, and all forms of bleed. **Heal (Night)** - Heal a player, preventing them from dying tonight, and cures poison. - Infinite uses. **Exhume (Night)** - Choose a dead player, Privately identify the class that killed them. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Priest vs. Soulcatcher [details = “Priest - Soulcatcher”] >## [color=steblue]The Priest **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Support**[/color] **Consume Soul (Passive)** - You cannot be killed at night while you have at least one soul. You lose a soul upon being attacked. **Bind Soul (Day)** - Makes a player Immune to death tonight. - 1 use. **Unleash Souls (Night)** - Lose all your souls. You will be told the class of a random player for each soul you previously held. - Unlimited. **Soul Trap (Night)** - If the target player dies at any point after using this ability, you will collect their soul. - Infinite uses. **Priest's Special:** **Vessel (Night)** - Target dead Blue Dragon player will be able to use their night ability, and it won't be visible to the Nightwatch/Observer. - 1 use *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Soulcatcher **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=purple]**Unseen Support**[/color] **Devoted (Passive)** - You are Immune to one attack on your life. **Call the Dead (Passive)** - Communicate with the dead at night. **Bind Soul (Day)** - Makes a player Immune to death tonight. - 1 use. **Collect Soul (Night)**- If your target dies you will obtain their soul. - Infinite uses (You start with 2 souls) **Reanimate (Night)** - Bring a dead Unseen player back to life. Each night they remain alive, a soul will be consumed. If you have no souls, or are converted, the player dies. You can target all players, but will only successfully revive Unseen members. They will be convert immune. - 1 use. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Princess vs. Duchess [details = “Princess - Duchess”] >## [color=steblue]The Princess[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. Dark Wisp (Night)** - The Blue Dragon will appear as normal Unseen members tonight - 2 uses **Bat Eyelashes (Night)** - Get a players class type. **Princess's Special** Get your target's exact class. -1 use *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Duchess[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **Flirt (Night)** - Check to see what class type the selected player is. You will receive two results, one of which will be their real type, and one won't be. - Infinite uses. **Will-O-Wisp (Night)** - Uncage a wisp, lighting your room. If someone visits you at night, the player you selected will have your visitor(s) revealed to them - 3 uses *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Psychic vs. Illusionist [details = “Psychic - Illusionist”] >## [color=steblue]The Psychic **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Social**[/color] **Telepathy (Day)** - Telepathically send a message to everyone; they will not know who sent it. - 2 uses. **Misdirect (Day)** - Force a player to accuse another player of Treason. - 2 uses. **Mindwarp (Night)** - Your target will receive incorrect results from their abilities tonight - Infinate use **Link Fates (Night)** - Two target players will suffer the same negative effects tonight, except killing and conversion. **Psychic's Special** This includes killing. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Illusionist **(Unique)**[/color]:shield: >[color=purple]**Unseen Social**[/color] **Telepathy (Day)** - Telepathically send a message to everyone; they will not know who sent it. - 2 uses. **Misdirect (Day)** - Force a player to accuse another player of Treason. - 2 uses. **Link Destinies (Night)** - Two target players will benefit from the same positive and negative effects other than killing and conversion tonight, like healing or occupation. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Maid vs. Handmaiden [details="Maid - Handmaiden"]
[color=steblue]The Maid (Unofficial Class)[/color] - [color=steblue]Blue Dragon Investigative (Unofficial Class)[/color]
**Poke Around (Day)* - Look in someone’s chambers to determine their class type. - 1 use **Matchmake (Night)** - Check 2 players to see if they’re the same class type. - Infinite uses **Room Service (Night)** - Occupy a player. - 2 uses
[color=purple]The Handmaiden (Unofficial Class)[/color] - [color=purple]Unseen Investigative[/color] **Service (Day)* - Check if the target player has Royal Blood. - 2 uses **Poke Around (Night)** - Look in someone’s chambers to determine their class type. - 2 uses **Matchmake (Night)** - Try to ‘hook up’ 2 players, you will be told whether they are compatible or not (see below). - Infinite Uses Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.
Compatibility:
- Members of opposing Factions are not compatible - Members of Neutral Factions are compatible with every Neutral Faction that they can win with - Royals are not compatible with each other that would be weird - The King and Fool are not compatible with anyone - The Mercenary is compatible with her target no matter the faction [/details]
Sheriff vs. Marshal [details = “Sheriff - Marshal”] >## [color=steblue]The Sheriff[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] **Show Badge (Passive)** - The Kidnapper will think you are the Marshal if you are jailed. **Scout (Day)** - Have a scout to follow the target player. The next morning you will discover their faction. - 2 uses. **Stakeout (Night)** - You will stakeout a target player's room, finding out any visitors' factions. **Sherrif's Special** You will find out their exact classes. - 1 use. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Marshal[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] **Show Badge (Passive)** - The Kidnapper will know you are the Marshal if you are jailed. **Fact Checking (Day)** - Determine if a previously investigated player has been converted to the Blue Dragon since checking them. - 2 uses. **Expert Investigation (Night)** - Determine if a player is a member of the Blue Dragon faction. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] Converted Scum Prince [details = “Scum Prince”] >## [color=steblue]The Prince **(Unique)**[/color] :shield: >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Unstoppable (Passive)** - Immune to being occupied at night. **Royal Blood (Passive)** - As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King. **Imprison (Day)** - Choose a player to imprison at night, Occupying the target (Bypasses Occupy Immunity). If you choose to imprison, you will not be able to talk with the rest of the Blue Dragon tonight. You instead talk with the imprisoned player- Infinite uses **Interrogate (Night)** - Interrogate your imprisoned player, finding out their class type. - Infinite uses. **[Prince's Special]** **Execute (Night)** - Execute your imprisoned player, bypassing night immunity. - 3 uses *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details] [/details] Classes that stay the same: - All neutrals
1. **Pug** 2. **Vulgard** 3. **Firekitten** 4. **MaximusPrime** 5. Frostwolf 6. Memesky 7. **Whammerist** 8. **Hippolytous** 9. **Moleland** 10. **Twilight (Twil1ght)** 11. Celeste_Lundenberg 12. **Poisoned_Squid** 13. Nuclearburrito 14. **Htm** 15. **Marluxion** 16. Light
Backups: 1. Shurian 2. Livicus 3.
Prods will be enforced so dont be discouraged if you are a backup if someone is not playing I can assure you they will be replaced
[details="Role List"] King [color=steblue]Negotiator[/color] [color=steblue]Insurgent[/color] [color=purple]Kidnapper[/color] [color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] [color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] [color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] [color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] [color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] [color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] [color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] [color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] [color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] / Random Neutral [color=purple]Random Unseen[/color] / Random Neutral Random Neutral Neutral Killer [/details]
Note: Revenant and Spiratualist - Warlock are banned from this game btw -
[details="Past Games"] https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-16-5-return-of-the-return-of-the-blue-dragon-hosted-by-wolfy-and-co-hosted-by-alfa-unseen-mercenary-and-alchemist-win/51164 (completed)
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-16-return-the-blue-dragon-hosted-by-wolfy-and-co-hosted-by-ashe-day-2-16-16/47817 (not completed) [/details]
Graveyard: -

I was inclined to pardon after that

item.title: SFOL 25 Return of the Blue Dragon II Unseen and Mercenary Win!

item.description:
It would have worked out fine, but BD would have been better off. I didn’t claim Day 2, but I would have occupied Celeste, and Frost would have been confirmed Night 2. Celeste would be confirmed as Insurgent.

Read full topic

item.source: SFOL 25 Return of the Blue Dragon II Unseen and Mercenary Win!

item.title: SFOL 25 Return of the Blue Dragon II Unseen and Mercenary Win!
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Pug:

no but like.

Celeste killed Wham and Haemophilia happened

Yes yes, I know.

Moleland:

Also you guys are idiots for even considering shackling the NK Day 2. We didn’t need him alive - we weren’t anywhere near Mylo

It was worth it, executing Insurgent was more important than Demon, otherwise I would be in jail and let Celeste have free attack.

Moleland:

Also, Alcoholic is trash - I don’t even get immunity to attacks I redirect.

Wasn’t suppose to be the target you selected will be immune to, but not like Werewolf attack from someone else?

Hippolytus:

if I was town I woulda made damn sure marl was hung D2. I was laughing my ass off when u guys innod him

Nah, like I said - Celeste was better lynch.

Twil1ight:

The game is already over? Lel i like when some people said that “Pardoning NK is dumb yada yada yada” and didn’t even notice that Unseen could get rid off 2 Killers in 1 day.
I’m gonna make a summary soon…

Thank you dearly.

Moleland:

Saying the former was the plan is a lie. Don’t try and take credit for that, as it only happened because Vulgard was smart.

I am with you there, if it wasn’t for me then it would be little different at N2.

Read full topic
item.source: SFOL 25 Return of the Blue Dragon II Unseen and Mercenary Win!

item.title: SFOL 25 Return of the Blue Dragon II Unseen and Mercenary Win!
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Twil1ight:

Lel i like when some people said that “Pardoning NK is dumb yada yada yada” and didn’t even notice that Unseen could get rid off 2 Killers in 1 day.

Sure, nothing to do with my point🐙

You can’t say that was a plan, when literally Vulgard didn’t follow the plan - at best you didn’t suggest shackling the demon… you just pardoned and moved on.

Read full topic
